text: The 1986 Bexley Council election took place on 8 May 1986 to elect members of Bexley London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the Conservative party stayed in overall control of the council. ==Background== ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1986 Category:1986 London Borough council elections
title: 1986 Bexley London Borough Council election
